February 4, 2022

[Exclusive Interview] Eskuche Discusses Relief Records Tour, Future Plans & More

We recently had the pleasure of touching base with Eskuche for an exclusive interview. He shared his excitement ahead of the Relief Records Tour alongside Mihalis Safras, plans for the future and more. Check it out!

March 1, 2022

Kaskade & deadmau5 Announce New Collaborative Project Called Kx5

Kaskade & deadmau5 have officially joined forces to form a group called Kx5! To add to the excitement, a brand-new single christened 'Escape' is set for release on March 11, 2022. Check it out!

February 24, 2022

Osheaga Reveals Full 2022 Lineup Following 3-Year Pandemic Hiatus

Osheaga is back, with the 15th-anniversary edition finally set to happen this summer! The last two editions were cancelled due to the pandemic. The organizers recently dropped its lineup. Check it out!

February 16, 2022

[Carl Cox Gearing up to Play in Montreal for ELEVATION 001 Stadium Show

On March 18, 2022, Carl Cox will be making his highly-anticipated return to Montreal and he's bringing some techno powerhouses to play at ELEVATION 001 at the Stade Olympique de Montréal. Grab your tickets before it's too late!

Read more →
February 4, 2022

Ottawa's New Monthly Bass Event 'Ritual' Debuts This Saturday

Audioform recently unveiled a brand-new bass event christened Ritual and it will be making its official debut tomorrow, March 5, 2022. Get ready for performances by talented locals, impressive lighting and much more. Check it out!
